answers.answer: Sorry to hear about the test. I was terrified on mine but luckily I was fine. Im sure it was a kick and I know exactly the feeling.. first time I felt my baby kicking I was crying with baby's daddy cause i ddidn't think I could do preg. Anyway baby kicked me and it was like telling me it would all be ok. And that therevwas a little someone inside who would love me. Haha it was a crazy feeling.  ;)good luck with everything and enjoy your pregnacy it will be ok. That baby will make it all ok ;)

At first they feel like flutters or gas bubbles, then they turn into little kicks! When you get in your 3rd trimester it looks pretty crazy & they begin to hurt! Lol also don't stress about failing your test.. You will probably just have to monitor your blood everyday and so some dieting. I got diagnosed at 28 weeks with gestational diabetes amd was very upset and scared. But mine has been under complete control and my baby looks great! Good luck.
Thanks! I go tomorrow for the 3 hr one,hopefully everything turns out fine and I don't have gd
I failed my one hour test and ended up passing my 3 hour
What were your numbers with the 1st one?
I failed my 1 hour test with my twins and I took a 3 hour test. Turned out it was fine.

question: After getting the news, I got all worried and stressed and then out of no where I flt a kick!! Its the most amazinf feeling ever! It's like my baby telling me don't worry, everything will b just fine! I'm 17 weeks 3 days by the way, ftm! I started feeling flutters around a week ago, but just now I felt like a kick inside me!! Could it been a kick??
title: after bad news about not passing my1 hr glucose test.....i just!!
